questions.question:

on the ground.

He wants to eat them in every possible order.

Why does Biru the Monkey say
backtracking is needed here?
options: Because only one order is required
Because all possible choices must be explored
Because the chillies must be sorted

It handles breaking the problem

When all possible solutions are required
